question_text: A user installs a PostScript driver on a PCL-only printer. What is the most likely outcome?
answer_options: The printer will automatically convert the language
The printer will produce blank pages or errors
The printer will print at a lower resolution
The printer will operate in scan-only mode
correct_answer: The printer will produce blank pages or errors
explanation: PostScript and PCL are different PDLs. Using the wrong driver may result in the printer being unable to interpret the commands, producing incorrect or blank output.
